title: What created the spirit world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Much better said is who created the spirit world? The Almighty Jehovah did. Since the physical created heavens could not contain him no more than a painter who created a painting of outer space, could live in his own creation . see1st kings 8:27 He created the spirit world God being the only one who was alive with nothing before him to create him thus the reason he is titled The creator and not the created. psalms 90:2 And he being throughly complete in himself lacking nothing was never ever lonely, is omniscient and omnipotent but not omnipresent , could accomplish such a feat as creating a spirit world heaven called the 3rd heaven, the heaven of heavens Deuteronomy 10:14 which would be independent of and beyond the two yet physical heavens he was going to create sometime after his creating the spirit heavens for his and his future yet to be future creations called superhuman spirit angelic sons of God Job 38:7 Revelation 5:11 for their dwelling place as well. see 1st kings 8:43 They were created by the one described as the very personification of love 1st John 4:8 the Great Jehovah who gave the gift of life to those who he knew would appreciate it. Revelation 4:11 He using his holy spirit called the finger of God exodus 8:19 exodus 31:18 that he used creating the spirit world heaven also created two physical heavens ,outer space heaven number 2 created sometime after the heaven of heavens spirit world number 3 in the order of creation and descent Isaiah 13:10 from up to down and earths atmospheric heaven numbered 1 in order of descent created last of all includes the Troposphere,Stratosphere, Mesosphere,Thermosphere and the uppermost Exosphere. This last created physical heaven had something very special created under it .see Isaiah 45:18 created by the most high psalms 83:18 Some ask the question how are those things mentioned above possible? Gods son Jesus lets us know matthew 19:26 and Jobs statement as well Job 42:2 Go to http://jw.org where I get all my information from and type in the question searchbox Does God Dwell in one Place? Is God EveryWhere ? Is God Omnipresent? Does God live in a specific location?

God created everything, visible and invisible. All thrones, powers, dominions and things whether living or non living (cf. Col. 1:16). He created the time-space continuum in which it all resides. But the spirit world may be of a different dimension than the four we live in.
